summary: Build “Smart Earning Hub” app (web implementation of the described multi-screen login/learning/earning/form/support app) with simple credential-gated admin features.
architectural_notes: Implement an admin gate: allow only usernames Abhishek/Adarsh with a separate admin password (12345) to access Analytics and Form Submissions views.

existing_features.title: Update the registration form so that a successful submit also sends the entered form data to the backend for storage (in addition to the current success confirmation UI).

Add two admin-only UI entry points (buttons) within ONLY the user-selected elements (the four provided XPaths) to access: (1) Analytics and (2) Registration Details. Each entry point must require entering username (must be exactly Abhishek or Adarsh) and password (must be exactly 12345) before the admin view is shown.
Create an Analytics admin view that is accessible only after successful credential entry and displays stored-form analytics computed from backend data.

Create a Registration Details admin view that is accessible only after successful credential entry and displays a readable list/table of all stored registration submissions (who filled the form and their details).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add admin-only Analytics button/section accessible only for users Abhishek and Adarsh after entering password 12345.
Add admin-only button/section (protected by password 12345) to view who filled the form and see stored registered details/submissions.
Implement backend persistence for registration submissions so the app can store and later retrieve who filled the form and their submitted details.
